contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 22, 2012 D Swiss Open
Swiss Open 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
swiss-open
Swiss Open Contest presented nearly 50 different Bands from 11 Countries in it's 25 Years of History till 2014. It was held in Kultur-Casino Bern first and since 1999 the 'Salle Blanche' in KKL Luzern provides a wonderful Frame for this popular Event.
See Also Contest Website: http://www.worldbandfestival.ch/ Switzerland
Set Test and Own Choice
Terra Australis
Kultur und Kongresszentrum (KKL), Luzern, Switzerland Best performance of contest march: Brass Band Treize Etoiles Best performance of orchestral transcription: Valaisia Brass Band
Sept. 3, 2012, 3:01 p.m. Sept. 24, 2014, 12:41 p.m.
1 Brass Band Treize Etoiles James Gourlay The Sorcerer's Apprentice
2 Valaisia Brass Band Arsène Duc Feste Romane (L'Ottobrata and La Befana) [O. Respighi, arr. H.Snell]
3 Ensemble de Cuivres Valaisan Jean-François Bobillier Firebird (excerpts)
4 Brassband Bürgermusik Luzern Michael Bach The Corsair
5 Brass Band Fribourg Frédéric Théodoloz Symphony No 4 (Andantino & Finale) [Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky arr. Nick Moore]
6 Jugend Brass Band Michelsamt Carlo Balmelli Les Vêpres Siciliennes [arr. Lorriman]
7 Wallberg Brass Band Garry Cutt Le Carnaval Romain [arr. Wrigth]
8 Brass Band Berner Oberland Corsin Tuor The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
9 Oberaargauer Brass Band Armin Bachmann Norma
10 Brass Band Luzern Land Susanne Rechsteiner Le Roi d'Ys
11 Entlebucher Brass Band Patrick Ottiger Overture to Rienzi [arr. Lorriman]
